//Compiled script will go here as you make it.
//Script Generated by Athena Script Creation Utility by PKGINGO
prontera.gat,173,200,6	script	WoE Castle Warper	757,{
	mes "[WoE Castle Warper]";
	mes "I can warp you to the Castle Grounds of 4 Cities.";
	next;
			menu "Prontera",prtg_cas,"Payon",payg_cas,"Geffen",gefg_cas,"Aldebaran",aldeg_cas,"Cancel",cancel;
	prtg_cas:
		warp "prt_gld.gat",	159,	38;	close;

	cancel:
		mes "Don't take too long to change your mind, WoE is awesome fun.";
		close;

	payg_cas:
		warp "pay_gld.gat",	202,	173;	close;

	gefg_cas:
		warp "gef_fild13.gat",	270,	225;	close;

	aldeg_cas:
		warp "alde_gld.gat",	186,	157;	close;

}
//End of NPC by Athena Script Creation Utility by PKGINGO
